song_name: I Can Take It From There
lyrics:
10 contributorsi can take it from there lyricsverse 1
aint nothin goin on in town tonight
except a loud party crowd drinkin too much beer
so baby tell me would it be all right
if we just take a little rain check and stay right here
im sure we could find somethin to do
as a matter of fact baby why dont you

chorus
grab a couple glasses and a bottle of wine
walk down the hall and turn down the lights
and baby while youre at it you might as well
let down your hair and i can take it from there
yeah i can take it from there

verse 2
im gonna put an old record on
conway twitty yeah girl id love to lay you down
kill the ringer on the telephone
aint gonna stop lovin you til the candle burns out
oh there it is that little smile of yours
come on baby what ya waiting for

chorus
grab a couple glasses and a bottle of wine
walk down the hall and turn down the lights
and baby while youre at it you might as well
let down your hair and i can take it from there
see chris young liveget tickets as low as 33you might also likebridge
tomorrows gonna be here way too soon
lets not waste another minute girl
i got plans for me and you

chorus
just grab a couple glasses and that bottle of wine
walk down the hall and darlin turn down those lights
baby while youre at it you might as well
let down your hair and i can take it from there
oh i can take it from there
i can take it from there yeah yeahembed
